1.featuretextwithbullet: 2/day you gain advantage on Str checks and saves, deal +2 damage on strength based melee attacks, and resistance vs bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage

then.featuretextwithbullet: Add Con mod to AC when not wearing armor

2.featuretextwithbullet: You can gain advantage on Str based melee attacks by granting advantage to attacks against you for the round
You gain advantage on Dex saves vs things you can see

3.featuretextwithbullet: You can rage an additional time per day

5.featuretextwithbullet: If not in heavy armor, your speed improves by 10 feet

6.featuretextwithbullet: You can rage an additional time per day

7.featuretextwithbullet: Gain advantage on initiative rolls, and you can enter a rage to not be surprised

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: Move half your speed when you rage

9.featuretextwithbullet: Your rage damage bonus increases to +3
Gain one additional weapon die of damage on a melee critical hit

11.featuretextwithbullet: Your rage can prevent being reduced to 0 hp (see rules)

12.featuretextwithbullet: You can rage an additional time per day

15.featuretextwithbullet: Your rages will no longer end early unless you choose

16.featuretextwithbullet: Your rage damage bonus increases to +4

17.featuretextwithbullet: You can rage an additional time per day

18.featuretextwithbullet: Can use your Str score in place of a Str check

20.featuretextwithbullet: You can rage any number of times per day
Your max Str and Con score is 24 and they increase by 4

name: Bard
weaponproficiencies: Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords

1.featuretextwithbullet: Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day)

2.featuretextwithbullet: Gain half your proficiency bonus on ability checks you aren't proficient in
You can perform during a short rest to cause any ally or yourself to gain an additional 1d6 hp (once) if healed during the rest

5.featuretextwithbullet: Regain Bardic Inspiration with short rest

6.featuretextwithbullet: You can perform as an action to give yourself and allies who can hear you advantage on saves vs charm and frightened for one round

10.featuretextwithbullet: You can learn two spells from any class

14.featuretextwithbullet: You can learn two more spells from any class

18.featuretextwithbullet: You can learn two more spells from any class

20.featuretextwithbullet: You regain a use of inspiration when you roll initiative and have none

5.featuretextwithbullet: Kill CR � undead that fail save vs turning

then.featuretextwithbullet: You can channel to restore spell slots 2/day

8.featuretextwithbullet: CR 1 undead can now be killed

10.featuretextwithbullet: Seek aid from your deity (see rules)

11.featuretextwithbullet: CR 2 undead can now be killed

14.featuretextwithbullet: CR 3 undead can now be killed

17.featuretextwithbullet: CR 4 undead can now be killed

then.featuretextwithbullet: You can channel to restore spell slots 3/day

20.featuretextwithbullet: Calls to your deity for aid are always answered

name: Druid
weaponproficiencies: Clubs, Daggers, Darts, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaffs, Scimitars, Sickles, Slings, Spears

2.featuretextwithbullet: You can shapeshift into the form of a beast as an action (see rules)

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: You can use wild shape to call a familiar (see rules)

18.featuretextwithbullet: You can cast Druid spells while wild shaped

20.featuretextwithbullet: You can wild shape at will

name: Fighter
armorproficiencies: Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields

1.featuretextwithbullet: Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests)

2.featuretextwithbullet: Take an extra action once between rests

17.featuretextwithbullet: Can take an extra action twice between rests

name: Monk
toolproficiencies: One type of artisan's tools OR one musical instrument

then.featuretextwithbullet: Add Wis mod to AC when not wearing armor or using a shield

1.featuretextwithbullet: When unarmed or using monk weapons, can use dex for attack and damage rolls, unarmed strikes deal more damage (d4), and can make an unarmed attack as a bonus action after normal attack action

2.featuretextwithbullet: You gain a reservoir of energy (ki points = monk level) which is restored during a rest
You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes right after using the attack action
You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dodge
You can use a bonus action and spend 1 ki point to Dash or Disengage and double the distance you can jump
When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 10 feet

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: Treat a single weapon as a monk weapon (see rules)

3.featuretextwithbullet: When you are hit by a ranged weapon attack you can use a reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + Dex mod + Monk level, and you can catch and throw the weapon if you would take 0 damage (see rules)

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: Gain a bonus action monk attack after a ki action

4.featuretextwithbullet: You can use a reaction to reduce fall damage by 5 x Monk level

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: Heal martial arts die + proficiency with two ki points and an action

5.featuretextwithbullet: You can spend 1 ki point when you hit a creature with a melee attack to force it to make a Con save or be stunned for a round

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: Use kl points to add 2 per (max 3) to a missed attack

6.featuretextwithbullet: Your unarmed attacks ignore resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks/damage
When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 5 more feet

7.featuretextwithbullet: When you would make a Dex save for half damage, you take no damage if you pass or half damage if you do not
If you are under an effect that is frightening or charming you, you can use an action to end it

9.featuretextwithbullet: While moving you can walk across liquids and vertical surfaces

10.featuretextwithbullet: You are immune to poison and disease
When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 5 more feet

13.featuretextwithbullet: You can understand all spoken languages and anyone who can speak can understand you

14.featuretextwithbullet: You are proficient in all saves and you can spend a ki point to reroll a failed save
When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 5 more feet

15.featuretextwithbullet: You no longer need to eat or drink, can not be magically aged, and are unaffected by old age

18.featuretextwithbullet: You can use an action and spend 4 ki points to gain resistance to all damage except force and become invisible for 1 minute; You can cast astral projection on yourself by spending 8 ki points
When you are not in armor or using a shield your speed improves by 5 more feet

20.featuretextwithbullet: You regain 4 ki points when you roll for initiative if you have none

name: Paladin
armorproficiencies: Light Armor, Medium Armor, Heavy Armor, Shields

1.featuretextwithbullet: As an action, detect the location of any celestial, fiend or undead and any consecrated or desecrated place or object within 60 feet (1 + Cha mod per day)

Gain a reservoir of healing power (5hp), and as an action, you can heal a creature you touch by draining that power. You can also cure one poison or disease from the creature by sacrificing 5hp from the reservoir

2.featuretextwithbullet: You can sacrifice a spell slot to deal (1 + spell level)d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 extra damage vs undead/fiends, when you hit with a melee weapon attack

6.featuretextwithbullet: You and allies within 10 feet gain your Cha mod as bonus on saves

then.featuretextwithbullet: You can channel to restore spell slots 2/day

10.featuretextwithbullet: You and allies within 10 feet gain immunity vs frightened

11.featuretextwithbullet: You deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage on melee weapon attacks

14.featuretextwithbullet: Touch a creature as an action to end one spell effect Cha mod/day

then.featuretextwithbullet: You can channel to restore spell slots 3/day

hp), and as an action, you can heal a creature you touch by draining that power. You can also cure one poison or disease from the creature by sacrificing 5hp from the reservoir

then.featuretextwithbullet: You can swim and climb at your normal pace and your speed improves by 5 feet
You reduce exhaustion by 1 per short rest and proficiency/day you can gain 1d8 + Wis temp hp as an action

14.featuretextwithbullet: You are untrackable without magic and you can hide as a bonus action

18.featuretextwithbullet: You do not have disadvantage for attacking blind, and can sense the location of invisible creatures within 30 feet

20.featuretextwithbullet: You can add Wis mod 1/turn to an attack or damage roll vs a favored enemy

name: Rogue
weaponproficiencies: Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords

2.featuretextwithbullet: You can dash, disengage, or hide as a bonus action

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: Gain advantage on an attack as a bonus action when you are motionless

5.featuretextwithbullet: You can use a reaction to take half damage when hit by a foe that you see

7.featuretextwithbullet: When you would make a Dex save for half damage, you take no damage if you pass or half damage if you do not

11.featuretextwithbullet: When you make a proficient check, you can take 10 after the roll

14.featuretextwithbullet: You can locate creatures within 10 feet by hearing

15.featuretextwithbullet: You are proficient in Wis saves

18.featuretextwithbullet: Attackers never have advantage vs you

20.featuretextwithbullet: You can take 20 instead of failing a check or hit when you would have missed once between rests

name: Sorcerer
weaponproficiencies: Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows

2.featuretextwithbullet: You have a max of 2 sorcery points used to alter spells and regain spell slots

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: You can reroll an ability check for a sorcery point

replacelinefromfeaturetext.lineends: sorcery points used to alter spells and regain spell slots

combinestrings: sorcery points used to alter spells and regain spell slots

11.featuretextwithbullet: Gain one 6th level spell that can be cast 1/day

20.featuretextwithbullet: Take one minute to regain all spell slots 1/day

name: Wizard
weaponproficiencies: Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows

1.featuretextwithbullet: Regain half your level (min 1) worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day)

18.featuretextwithbullet: You choose a 1st and 2nd level spell which you can cast at will at their given spell level

20.featuretextwithbullet: You choose two 3rd level spells which you no longer need to prepare and can each be cast at 3rd level without a spell slot once between rests

1.featuretextwithbullet: As an action, use tools to give a tiny object a visual, auditory, or olfactory effect (see rules).

2.featuretextwithbullet: You learn four infusions which you can use on two objects at once (see rules).

3.featuretextwithbullet: You can take an hour to make a set of artisan's tools (see rules)

7.featuretextwithbullet: Add your Int mod to a save or check within 30 feet (Int mod/day)

10.featuretextwithbullet: You can make magic items for half the price at x4 speed and can attune a 4th magic item

11.featuretextwithbullet: You can put a 1st or 2nd level spell within an object (see rules)

14.featuretextwithbullet: You can ignore most magic item restrictions and attune a 5th item

20.featuretextwithbullet: As a reaction you can expend an infusion to prevent going unconcious, and item attunement increases saves (see rules)
